SEARCH
Package boundary

Class HDBOfficerMenu

java.lang.Object
boundary.ApplicantMenu
boundary.HDBOfficerMenu
public class HDBOfficerMenu extends ApplicantMenu
The HDBOfficerMenu class provides the user interface for HDB officer users.

This boundary class:

  • Displays BTO projects the officer is assigned to
  • Manages successful applications and flat booking process
  • Handles officer project registration and assignment
  • Generates official booking receipts for applicants
  • Supports password changes and other account operations
Version:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • show

      public void show()
      Description copied from class: ApplicantMenu
      Displays the main applicant menu and handles user selections.

      Provides options for:

      • Viewing available projects
      • Managing applications
      • Managing enquiries
      • Generating receipts
      • Changing passwords
      • Logging out
      Overrides:
      show in class ApplicantMenu

    • showApplicantMenu

      private void showApplicantMenu()
      Displays the menu for the applicant mode of the HDB officer interface. This menu provides access to applicant-specific operations such as:
      • Viewing available BTO projects
      • Viewing and managing personal applications
      • Creating and viewing enquiries
      • Generating application receipts
      • Changing password

    • showOfficerMenu

      private void showOfficerMenu()
      Displays the menu for the officer mode of the HDB officer interface. This menu provides access to officer-specific operations such as:
      • Viewing and registering for available projects
      • Managing the assigned project
      • Responding to project enquiries
      • Processing applications and flat bookings
      • Generating booking receipts

    • viewProjectsRegister

      private void viewProjectsRegister()
      Displays BTO projects available for officer registration and allows the officer to register. This method:
      • Filters for projects with available officer slots
      • Shows only projects the officer is eligible to register for
      • Handles the registration process
      • Updates the system after successful registration
      Registration is subject to approval by an HDB Manager before the officer can process applications.

    • viewMyProject

      private void viewMyProject()
      Displays detailed information about the project the officer is assigned to. This method shows:
      • Basic project information (name, neighborhood, application period)
      • Officer registration status (approved or pending)
      • Remaining units by flat type
      If the officer is not assigned to any project, displays an appropriate message.

    • viewProjectEnquiries

      private void viewProjectEnquiries()
      Displays and manages enquiries for the officer's assigned project. This method:
      • Lists all enquiries related to the officer's project
      • Allows the officer to select an enquiry to reply to
      • Processes the officer's reply and updates the enquiry
      Requires the officer to be assigned to a project and have approved registration status.

    • viewAndProcessApplications

      private void viewAndProcessApplications()
      Displays and processes applications for the officer's assigned project. This method:
      • Lists all applications for the assigned project
      • Shows application details including applicant info and status
      • Provides options to process flat booking for successful applications
      Requires the officer to be assigned to a project and have approved registration status.

    • processFlatBooking

      private void processFlatBooking(List<BTOApplication> applications)
      Processes the flat booking for a successful application. This method:
      • Validates the application status (must be SUCCESSFUL)
      • Shows available flat types with remaining units
      • Handles flat selection and confirmation
      • Updates the application status and project inventory
      • Generates a booking receipt for the applicant
      Parameters:
      applications - List of applications for the officer's project

    • generateReceipt

      protected void generateReceipt()
      Description copied from class: ApplicantMenu
      Generates a receipt for a booked flat application.

      This method creates a detailed receipt for applicants who have successfully booked a flat. The receipt includes:

      • Applicant's personal information (name, NRIC, age, marital status)
      • Project details (name, location, flat type)
      • Booking information (date, status)

      The receipt is saved as a text file in the "output_applicant" directory with a filename that includes the applicant's NRIC and project name for easy identification.

      This method is only available for applications with BOOKED status.

      Overrides:
      generateReceipt in class ApplicantMenu
